import React, { useState } from "react"; function Form(){ const [values, setValues] = useState({ name : ' ', email : ' ', mobile : ' ', password : ' ' }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ setValues({...values, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); localStorage.setItem(values); console.log("your form values", values); } return( <>




) } export default Form;
